content: {"name": "Nourishing Gardens Food Bank\ufeff", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients are served by appointment only\nEnrollment requires a picture ID with local address, proof of residency, number of household members, and annual income. Contact us to schedule a appointment at 734-713-7715.\nWhen you first enroll with Nourishing Gardens Food Bank, you will receive a membership card. You are required to present the membership card each time you come to get a supplimental food box. You will be unable to receive a supplimental food box without your membership card", "email": "", "url": "https://www.yellowpages.com/belleville-mi/mip/nourishing-gardens-food-bank-515556370", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "24831 Sumpter Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Belleville", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48111", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.1217672, "longitude": -83.4804829}, "phones": [{"number": "(734) 713-7715", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
